page.title: 19Employment
page.content: We tried to find out what kind of work local people did. There are not many people in the area who are considered as 'locals', for most of the larger houses have been bought by professional people who work outside the area. As most of the area is used for farming, there are still some local people who work on the farms. One or two people have businesses which are connected with furniture making or renovating, operating from their own premises. There are also some people who sell their vegetable produce. Ingatestone Nurseries employ four full-time staff to sell a wide range of garden plants and equipment along the old Roman road. We also found two boarding kennels in the area, one of which is mentioned on page 17.
